description: Ion Aliman secured 64% of votes in Deveselu, despite having died from coronavirus complications.
title: Romanian mayor wins election two weeks after Covid-related death
title_page: Romanian mayor wins election two weeks after Covid-related death - BBC News
maintext: "He was a real mayor to us," another woman told local outlet ProTV, Reuters reported. "He took the side of the village, respected all the laws. I don't think we will see a mayor like him again."
